original_text: When it was time to eat a meal, Boaz said to Ruth, ‘Come here and eat with us. Take some bread and mix it with the wine.’ So Ruth sat down to eat with the workers. Boaz gave her some grain that someone had cooked. She ate all that she wanted, and she still had some with her.
korean_text: 식사할 때에 보아스가 룻에게 이르되 이리로 와서 떡을 먹으며 네 떡 조각을 초에 찍으라 하므로 룻이 곡식 베는 자 곁에 앉으니 그가 볶은 곡식을 주매 룻이 배불리 먹고 남았더라

sentences.original_text: When it was time to eat a meal
Come here and eat with us
Take some bread and mix it with the wine
So Ruth sat down to eat with the workers
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 룻은 일꾼들과 함께 앉아 식사했습니다

sentences.original_text: Boaz gave her some grain that someone had cooked
sentences.korean_translation: 보아스가 그녀에게 누군가가 요리한 곡식을 주었습니다

sentences.original_text: She ate all that she wanted
and she still had some with her
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그녀는 여전히 약간을 가지고 있었습니다
